      • createGame

        @RequestMapping(method=POST)
public java.lang.Long createGame(@RequestBody
                                                              CreateGameDTO createGameDTO)
                                                       throws InvalidRequiredArgumentException,
                                                              SamePlayerException
        Creates new Game.
        Parameters:
        createGameDTO - CreateGameDTO contains ids of players willing to play in Game.
        Returns:
        Id of newly created Game.
        Throws:
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException
        SamePlayerException

      • joinGame

        @RequestMapping(value="/{gameId}/join",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public boolean joinGame(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Long gameId,
                                                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                          java.lang.Long playerId)
                                                                                                                                   throws GameNotExistException
        Joins Player to Game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game to which Player wants to join
        playerId - Id of the Player who wants to join Game
        Returns:
        true if joined successfully, false otherwise
        Throws:
        GameNotExistException - when Game with given Game id does not exist

      • makeMove

        @RequestMapping(value="/{gameId}/move",
                method=POST)
public MoveResponseDTO makeMove(@PathVariable
                                                                                                     java.lang.Long gameId,
                                                                                                     @RequestBody
                                                                                                     CreateMoveDTO createMoveDTO)
                                                                                              throws GameNotExistException,
                                                                                                     InvalidRequiredArgumentException,
                                                                                                     NotPlayerTurnException,
                                                                                                     GameHasFinishedException
        Makes Move in given Game.
        Parameters:
        gameId - Id of the Game in which Move should be made.
        createMoveDTO - CreateMoveDTO describes Move which should be made.
        Returns:
        MoveResponseDTO with field wasMoveValid set to true if Move was valid, set to false otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidRequiredArgumentException - when Player does not have playerType set
        NotPlayerTurnException - when Player wants to make Move when it is not its turn
        GameNotExistException - when Game with given Game id does not exist
        GameHasFinishedException
